title: Changing Runes In Lobby Bugged
body:
Haven't been on these forums for ages, poorly labelled, so not sure where to report bugs.

In any event, the rune page in the lobby of any given game enables you to change them (awesome!), however, it doesn't always bring up the intended page. E.g.:

I have 'Rune Page 1', 'Rune Page 2', and 'Rune Page 3', my current default is 'Rune Page 2', as it was from the previous game and dedicated to a specific champion, as is 'Rune Page 3', so if I want a customise a rune page for X champion, I would use 'Rune Page 1' and toy around with it. With that said, when I change to 'Rune Page 1' in the drop-down menu within the lobby and click on 'Edit' it will still load 'Rune Page 2', which is rather annoying, and assume "Not working as intending", please fix.
